de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.plugin.algo
Class LCE

java.lang.Object
  de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.plugin.algo.LCE

public class LCE
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains a sketch of what to do to get the LCE through the LCA in constant time. Such a constant time LCE-computation can be used for linear-time matching with wild cards and k-mismatch (see Gusfield), instead of the used naive computation of LCE in KMismatch and Wildcards.

TODO: Add proper way to the WordSuffixTree to get the leaf for a specific suffix, then the constant time LCE computation would basically work

This class also contains static methods for naive computations of the LCE.

Author:
Fabian Steeg (fsteeg)

getLongestCommonExtension

                                     int j)

Attention: This doesn't work properly, it's a sketch. Use the static, naive implementations in this class.

Parameters:
i - The start-index in text 1
j - The start-index in text 2
Returns:
Returns the longest common extension of the two strings in this LCE beginning at i and j for text1 and 2 respectively.
